Posts.Content: hello all my sister was diagnosed recently with stage 2 breast cancer, and will be starting her chemo/radiation protocol this week. i am trying to find a new york city based naturopath to be in charge of her nutritional and alternative approaches to beating this disease. has anyone used or heard of a naturopath in the new york city area who they thought was fabulous? thanks, margie
Posts.Title: Finding a Naturopath in New York City
